trans-unit.target: Observe que isso só será verdadeiro se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle chamado protegido <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Save%2A> método diretamente.

trans-unit.source: In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.
trans-unit.target: Na implementação do ASP.NET, um método auxiliar interno, na verdade, é chamado para executar o salvamento e esse método auxiliar silenciosamente retorna se o usuário atualmente em execução não tem direitos para modificar dados.

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have the capability called <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability" />.
trans-unit.target: O usuário atual não tem a funcionalidade denominada <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ModifyStateUserCapability" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> não pode referenciar um provedor de personalização válido.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: No personalization provider is currently associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum provedor de personalização está associado, no momento, à instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: This can occur if this method is called prior to calling <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> (the personalization provider reference is obtained during the call to <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" />.
trans-unit.target: Isso poderá ocorrer se esse método for chamado antes de chamar <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" /> (a referência do provedor de personalização é obtida durante a chamada a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: No personalization state has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum estado de personalização foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> associado é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> na instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> associada do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo de personalização para o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> pai.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> instance indicating the scope of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> instância que indica o escopo de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: This value is initially set based on the value returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor é inicialmente definido com base no valor retornado do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.Load%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This value can be modified by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse valor pode ser modificado por chamar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information.
trans-unit.target: Observe que isso representa o escopo usado para aplicar e extrair informações de personalização.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property might differ from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessa propriedade pode diferir do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.InitialScope%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ChangeScope%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> pai como tendo dados de personalização que foram alterados (é "sujo").

trans-unit.source: Marks the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> pai como tendo dados de personalização que foram alterados (é "sujo").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> está definida como `true`, esse método marca pai <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle como "sujos".

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo dos detalhes da implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> a instância do controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, esse método pode invocar as verificações de segurança e verificações de permissão de segurança de acesso de código.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internamente, este método chama o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationState.SetWebPartManagerDirty%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> property rather than through this method.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle controla o estado de "sujo" internamente e expõe "dirtiness" do Gerenciador por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable.IsDirty%2A> propriedade em vez de usar esse método.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum dado de personalização foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".
trans-unit.target: O controle de Web Parts a ser marcado como "sujo".

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").
trans-unit.target: Marca o controle de Web Parts especificado como tendo dados de personalização que foram alterados (é "sujo").

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty".
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsEnabled%2A> está definida como `true`, esse método marca o controle de Web Parts especificado como "sujos".

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation details of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.
trans-unit.target: Dependendo dos detalhes da implementação de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> a instância do controle de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization>, esse método pode invocar as verificações de segurança e verificações de permissão de segurança de acesso de código.

trans-unit.source: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: Tentou marcar como "sujo" um controle de Web Parts não gerenciado pelo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> pai.

trans-unit.source: No personalization data has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: Nenhum dado de personalização foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os dados de personalização da página atual foram redefinidos (por exemplo, foi feita uma solicitação para excluir os dados de personalização do armazenamento de dados subjacente).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o estado de personalização para a página atual foi redefinido; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade é definida como `true`, isso indica que o estado de personalização para a página atual foi redefinido e extração de dados de personalização de controles e as subsequentes salva operações deve ser ignorada.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: No momento, essa propriedade é definida automaticamente como `true` pela infraestrutura de personalização se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ResetPersonalizationState%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> event to have any effect.
trans-unit.target: Observe que, embora não haja nenhuma restrição sobre quando essa propriedade pode ser definida, a propriedade deve ser definida como `true` antes de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.SaveStateComplete> evento tenha efeito.

trans-unit.source: Switches the current page's personalization scope from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> or from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" />.
trans-unit.target: Muda o escopo de personalização da página atual de <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> para <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> ou de <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> para <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" />.

trans-unit.source: This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope.
trans-unit.target: Esse método alterna o escopo de personalização da página em execução no momento.

trans-unit.source: Toggling the scope results in a <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> back to the current executing page.
trans-unit.target: Alternar o escopo resulta em um <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.Transfer%2A> voltar à página atual em execução.

trans-unit.source: This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não executa nenhuma operação se ele é chamado durante a exportação ou importação de um controle de Web Parts está ocorrendo.

trans-unit.source: If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request.
trans-unit.target: Se uma solicitação de escopo de alternância ocorre para uma página que foi enviada por meio de um `POST` solicitação e, em seguida, quaisquer valores de cadeia de caracteres de consulta serão preservados durante a transferência; parâmetros de cadeia de caracteres de consulta não são preservados se a página foi enviada por meio de um `GET` solicitação.

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.ToggleScope%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: This code is part of a larger code sample found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class description.
trans-unit.target: Esse código é parte de um exemplo de código maior encontrado no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> descrição de classe.

trans-unit.source: The current user does not have the user capability to enter <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope when attempting to switch from <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> scope to <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> scope.
trans-unit.target: O usuário atual não tem uma funcionalidade de usuário para inserir o escopo <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" /> ao tentar mudar do escopo <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.User" /> para o escopo <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope.Shared" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance has not completed initialization.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> não concluiu a inicialização.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance for the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> do <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> associado é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control's associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Page.Request" /> na instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Page" /> associada do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to toggle to a scope that is not defined in the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa para alternar para um escopo não definido na enumeração <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: Technically, this situation should never occur.
trans-unit.target: Tecnicamente, essa situação nunca deveria ocorrer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of user capabilities from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> granted to the current user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de funcionalidades de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability" /> concedidas ao usuário atual.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary" /> if the user is anonymous.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> que contém o conjunto de recursos de usuário concedida para o usuário atual ou vazio <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.HybridDictionary" /> se o usuário é anônimo.

trans-unit.source: Currently the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartUserCapability> classe contém dois valores, que indica os recursos do usuário: `modifyState` e `enterSharedScope`.

trans-unit.source: For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para facilidade de uso, os recursos contidos no dicionário podem ser verificados com as propriedades de auxiliar <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.IsModifiable%2A> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization.CanEnterSharedScope%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.
trans-unit.target: Observe as restrições sobre como alterar recursos depois de cada uma dessas propriedades tenham sido acessada; Para obter detalhes, consulte a seção de descrição de cada propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of the current parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control associated with this <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma instância do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> pai atual associado a esta instância <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization" />.

trans-unit.source: The current parent <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.
trans-unit.target: O pai atual <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control associated with this instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> class.
trans-unit.target: Use esta propriedade para determinar a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle associado a esta instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartPersonalization> classe.
